{"id":1454813378,"question_id":3202,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1731811184,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"52 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1454813378/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"High-Access Employees","memory":"46.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    static bool cmp(vector<string>& a, vector<string>& b ) {\n        return (a[0]<b[0]) || (a[0]== b[0] && a[1] <= b[1]);\n    }\n    vector<string> findHighAccessEmployees(vector<vector<string>>& access_times) {\n        //three or more times within a one-hour period.\n        sort(access_times.begin(), access_times.end(), cmp);\n        vector<string> res;\n        int i=0;\n        while(i<access_times.size()) {\n            int j=i+1;\n            while(j<access_times.size() && access_times[j][0] == access_times[i][0])\n                j++;\n            j--;\n            int count = j-i+1;\n            int start = i;\n            int end = j;            \n            i = j + 1; \n            if(count <3)\n                continue;\n\n            while(start <= end-2) {\n                bool wh = withinHour(access_times[start][1], access_times[start+2][1]);\n                if(wh) {\n                    res.push_back(access_times[start][0]);\n                    break;\n                } else\n                    start++;\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n    bool withinHour(string t1, string t2) {\n        int time1 = stoi(t1.substr(0,2))*60 + stoi(t1.substr(2,2));\n        int time2 = stoi(t2.substr(0,2))*60 + stoi(t2.substr(2,2));\n\n        return time2-time1 < 60;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"high-access-employees","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
